sections.heading: The purpose of this chapter is to provide authority to a designated state agency for the procurement and distribution of federal surplus personal property for public agencies; for eligible nonprofit, tax-exempt educational and health organizations; and for eligible nonprofit, tax-exempt organization
sections.text: The purpose of this chapter is to provide authority to a designated state agency for the procurement and distribution of federal surplus personal property for public agencies; for eligible nonprofit, tax-exempt educational and health organizations; and for eligible nonprofit, tax-exempt organizations that assist the homeless.History.—s. 1, ch. 65-173; s. 9, ch. 83-334; s. 161, ch. 92-279; s. 55, ch. 92-326.

sections.heading: As used in this act, the term:(1)“Department” means the Department of Management Services
sections.text: (2)“Surplus property” means any federal property which has been declared excess by a federal agency, including the Department of Defense, and made available for procurement and distribution in the state in comp
